text: Sagramor de Scuvero Brandão (September 30, 1921 – October 9, 1995) was a Brazilian actress, radio personality and councillor. == Biography == Born in 1921, she started as a radio personaliry in São Paulo. She married with composer Miguel Gustavo and they had two daughters, they moved to Rio de Janeiro and continued working at radio. He worked at Rádio Bandeirantes and Rádio Mayrink Veiga. She was also a municipal councilor from 1948 to 1956. She died of cancer in 1995. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Brazilian radio personalities Category:Cancer deaths in Brazil
title: Sagramor de Scuvero Brandão
